name: 48 Steps
description:
48 Steps

48 Steps is a unique puzzle platform where you work your way through challenging levels - however - you only have 48 moves to complete each level.

Avoid spikes, solve puzzles, and work through obstacles to try win the game. The steps you don't use will carry over to the next level. Good luck.

How To Play:

Left & Arrow Keys - Move Left & Right

Up Arrow Key - Jump

Space - Dash (When unlocked)

Music:

pixelsphere.org / The Cynic Project
